title: Kaleidoscope Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan options include several salads (ask for no cheese), several pasta entrees with soyrizo and/or portobello and veggie stack sandwich (ask for no cheese). Fresh fruit can be substituted for fries. Uses fresh, local ingredients. Offers flourless desserts. Located in a unique building and neighborhood. Wi-fi. Kind and attentive staff.
